text:
Getting Ready for Open Enrollment
By Jennifer Milner|Sunday, September 25, 2016

Enrolling in a new health insurance plan can be a painless process with a little preparation beforehand. To get started, youll want to determine who in your family needs coverage. Next, make a list of all your preferred doctors that you would like to be in network, as well as any recurring prescriptions that you will need covered. Keep that list handy when youre ready to start searching for plans.
Depending on your income and household size, you may qualify for money-saving tax credits that will help to reduce your monthly premium. Youll want to have the following information handy to determine what you qualify for and to complete your enrollment:
If applicable:
Thats all youll need to get going. If you have any questions along the way, our licensed agents are ready to assist you. Just give them a call at (866) 602-8466. Happy shopping!
